InstructionData.Title: Vending Machine POC
InstructionData.Description: Proof of concept for interacting with a Vending Machineâ€‹
InstructionData.Author: MrDrummer25
InstructionData.Instructions:
define Vending -443130773 define LogicMemory -851746783
start: yield
lbns r0 Vending HASH("Vending Machine 2") 2 Quantity Sum lbns r1 Vending HASH("Vending Machine 2") 2 OccupantHash Sum
s db Setting r0 sbn LogicMemory HASH("OccupantMemory") Setting r1
j start
